document.full_text: china dismissed a u.s. call for it to free dissidents and fully account for the victims of the bloody tiananmen crackdown, on the anniversary of the crushing of the pro-democracy uprising 22 years ago.
document.title: china dismisses u.s. call on tiananmen anniversary
lines_and_colors: china dismissed a u.s. call for it to free dissidents and fully account for the victims of the bloody tiananmen crackdown, on the anniversary of the crushing of the pro-democracy uprising 22 years ago.
